trigger_description: This Trigger fires every time a photo is saved in the folder you specify. NOTE: will process up to 15 photos per polling period.
This Trigger fires every time any file is saved in the folder you specify. NOTE: will process up to 15 files per polling period.

trigger: New text file in your folder
trigger_description: This Trigger fires every time any text file is saved in the folder you specify. NOTE: will process up to 15 files per polling period.
This trigger fires every time a shared link for a file is created. Note: doesn't include folders.
